title: funny
message: I'm gonna ask. Say something horny or funny or something. Something funny. I was told to say something funny. I'm a comedian. I am giving a talk right now on how to be a comedian You just have to be funny. Thank you for coming to my TED Talk, I think. Fuck me in the asshole, baby.
summary: The speaker is pretending to give a comedic talk on how to be a comedian, but then abruptly transitions into making a crude and inappropriate remark. The text is a mix of humor, vulgarity, and a play on giving a TED Talk.
